idea:
Our vision is to transform the learning for vocational studies. It is to fill the gap for the

requirement of assistants & therapist in the setup of clinics & hospitals. Our course

curriculum is devised by a renowned dermatologist & internationally published author of two

books on study of clinical cosmetology - Dr Sonia Tekchandani. We have devised curriculum

that could train medical doctors & train other professionals to work as therapist or assistant to

them. We see many medical professionals who have put in years of studying, struggle to

pursue these courses along with their practice. Tender Skin International Cosmetology

Academy has trained many students across India & abroad but now by obtaining exclusive

rights from the MSBVE – Ministry of Skill Development & Entrepreneurship ( MoSDE) we

104, Linkway Estate, New Link Road, Next to ICICI BANK,Near Inorbit Mall,

Mumbai, Maharashtra 400064

look forward to reach out & teach more students & help them in providing job opportunities

leading to employment.
name: TenderSkinInternationalCosmetologyAcademy

idea: Mcare is a Mumbai-based company, which provides Mobile Protection Plans. We are currently present all over India, enabling our mission to reduce unwarranted e-waste by creating a sustainable business that revolves around repair, refurbish and reuse.We are here so you can protect your mobile phones with our ‘ Protection Plan’ and get your phone repaired in a hassle-free way. We do that with a team that works with a hint of class, a touch of creativity, and a sustainable heart, by building a community that works for the planet.
name: Mcare

idea: On-demand driver and road assistance services  at your fingertips via smartphone applications.
name: JOBBIE SERVICES INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Clovero is a one stop solution for all your basic requirements. Bent as we are at establishing a global presence for our services, we aim to make Indian goods and products accessible not only to the rest of the country, but to the world at large. Our undying vision of setting up offices and agents across the Globe speaks for itself. So much so, that the company has not just struck out in international trade, but also recognises itself as a multi-product conglomerate today.
name: CLOVERO INDIA LLP

idea: We are in the business of developing and promoting craft and artisinal beers for India's nascent and fast growing craft beer industry.
name: Lost River Brewing

idea:
Celewish.com is India`s 1st Celebrity MeetnGreet platform where any common man can use their favourite celebrity one on one or virtually.

Celewish platform having more than 1000+ celebrities / influencers / athletes on-boarded on the platform.

Any end user can place requests from celebrities for these services 

1. MeetNGreet one-on-one

2. Virtual MeetnGreet

3. Personalised Video Wishes

4. Instagram DM Wishes from Celebs


Any brand or start up can request these services from celebrities.


1. Commercials Video Bytes for brand or start up from celebrities/influencers

2. Social Media Promotions

3. Brand Endorsements

4. Appearances


Here is the link for our website – www.celewish.com

 

Here is the link of our Instagram Handle – www.instagram.com/celewishmedia

 

Link of Celewish Presentation - https://drive.google.com/file/d/1wFageqU20OvB9k0ajeB45DiPocLgbjTD/view?usp=sharing


We want to make this platform globally number-1 & our aim to take all the indian & global celebrities on one platform.

We are launching master classes as well in next phase where any common man can learn skills from Celebrities / Athletes / Content Creators online.


Thanks,

Mohsin Khan

Founder

Celewish Media Pvt Ltd

9784164164
name: CELEWISH MEDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: The Hobby Tribe is one of Indias or possibly one of the World's First Hobby Tech Company. An Online Live and Offline - All Hobby Learning Platform, founded in January 2020. Providing Hobby learning classes with affordability and convenience to all ages. We are on a mission to create a world wide hobby learning ecosystem, empowering HobbyEnthusiast/Artists/Musician alike create a career in doing what they love. Building a strong Hobby Enabler - Hobby Learner society, A TRIBE ! We have The Hobby Service where we believe everyone has the right to pursue their favorite hobby and money shouldn't be a barrier, so for the underprivileged we provide workshops for FREE. So come join the Tribe and help us build this hobby ecosystem.
name: SALINS TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
HOME & HERITAGE aims to provide tasty, convenient & healthy gourmet food for modern day lifestyle. Our handcrafted products range from versatile sauces, flavoured salts, gluten-free millet noodles to spice noodles, grain noodles, vegetable noodles and traditional masalas.

All products are 100% vegetarian and trans fat-free. Made from original recipes, they are also preservative and chemical free!
name: HOME & HERITAGE

idea:
Gigs Media is a performance marketing agency working with you to reach business goals through a bouquet of 360-degree digital marketing services.

Design a website, create an app, craft performance marketing strategy or develop landing pages for generating leads. We can take care of everything under one roof to deliver ROI-based performance for your business.

Consider us to be an extension of your team. In us, you’ll find colleagues who want to understand you and take your digital presence to the next level. Enjoy the feeling of working with an experienced team that’s armed with proven strategies while being enthusiastic enough to try innovative ideas.

With your vision and our diverse experience, we aim to solve critical business challenges while getting enormous value for your every dime.
name: GIGS MEDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
